properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana Mungu ee Bwana,
ee Bwana Mungu
(ee Bwana) Mungu
ee Mungu uturekebishe
na utuangazishe.
Na utuangazishe na
utuangazishe uso wako.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wewe uchungaye,
uchungaye Israeli,
utie nuru uziamshe
nguvu zako .

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Wewe uketiye juu
ya makerubi
Utie nuru uziamshe
nguvu zako.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ewe Mwenyezi Mungu
utuangalie,
Kwa wema wako
nasi tutaokoka.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Na mkono wako,
na uwe juu yake.
Huo mzabibu ulopandwa
kwa mkono wako.
